background_story: Carlita Er was orphaned at a young age when their parents were killed by a band of marauders. Carlita was taken in by the local fighters guild and trained in the art of combat. Carlita has always been impulsive, and often act without thinking. This has gotten them into trouble on more than one occasion. But, Carlita is also fiercely loyal and will do anything to protect their friends and allies. They have a strong sense of justice, and often go on adventures to right wrongs and help those in need. Carlita can be vengeful, and will go to great lengths to get revenge on those who have harmed them or their loved ones. They are also quite pessimistic, and often see the worst in people and situations.

background_story: Cristy Mirrikenen was born into a wealthy family of dwarves in the Forgotten Realms. Her parents were always busy with work and didn't have much time for her, so she was raised by her grandparents. They instilled in her a sense of justice and fairness, and she grew up to be a strong and independent woman. When her grandparents died, Cristy took over the family business and ran it with a iron fist. She made many enemies during her years as a businesswoman, but she always remained true to her sense of justice. One day, she was approached by a group of paladins who asked her to join their order. She hesitated at first, but eventually decided to join them. She has been fighting for justice ever since.

background_story: Pat Usarkrik was born in the small village of Windy Valley in the Forgotten Realms. She grew up surrounded by nature and quickly developed a strong connection to the natural world. When she was old enough, she began to study druidism and quickly rose to become one of the most respected druids in the land. She has always been a champion of equality and harmony, and her vengeful nature has been known to lash out at those who threaten the balance of the natural world. She is a wise and intuitive woman, and her counsel is often sought by those who seek to protect the wilderness.

background_story: Sascha Voldarkgalis was born in the small halfling village of Willowbrook in the Forgotten Realms. She was the youngest of four children and was always getting into mischief. When she was eight, her village was attacked by a group of bandits. Sascha's family was killed and she was the only one who survived. She was found by a group of adventurers who took her in and trained her to be a fighter. Sascha swore to never let anything happen to another village like Willowbrook again. She has since been on many adventures, always striving to be the best fighter she can be.

image_prompt: Create a Environmental Portrait of Sofia Isther. Sofia Isther is a Old Female Halfling with a uniform body type. Sofia has snowy short bob hair and multi-colored eyes. Pumpkin and Burnt Orange tones. Candlelight. --seed 529
background_story: Sofia Isther is a bard from the Forgotten Realms. She was born into a family of halflings who were always on the move. She never really had a home, but she always had music. She would sing and play her lute wherever she went, and people would always stop to listen. She quickly learned that she could use her music to manipulate people, and she started using it to get what she wanted. She became very successful at it and started to make a lot of money. However, she always felt guilty about manipulating people and would often give her earnings to charity. She also started to use her music to protect people. She would often sing songs that would inspire people to stand up for themselves and fight for what was right. She became known as a voice for the oppressed and became very popular among the halflings.
